programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep5
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Report the Asia News on Asian view

programme.title: Walking around China Ep210
programme.desc: It focuses on the latest changes in China from a humanistic perspective, pays attention to new phenomena, new fashions, and new things around ordinary Chinese people,

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep31
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News

programme.title: Talk with LuJian Ep5

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: 2025 Hualien New Years Countdown Party M 2025 Ep1
programme.desc: The 2025 Hualien New Years Countdown Party is more than just a musical feast. It boasts Taiwans most starstudded lineup and exclusive surprises guaranteed to excite the audience! With toptier performers like Show Lo, Golden Melody Award winner Ricky Hsiao, and an impressive array of stars including Matzka, Papun Band, Tyson Yoshi, VERA, HUR, Usay Kawlu, Abus, Trout Fresh, IVAN, and more, paired with a breathtaking fireworks show, this spectacular event promises unforgettable moments you wont want to miss!1802025MatzkaTyson YoshiVERAHURUsay KawluIVAN

programme.title: New Taiwan Go M Ep3079
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality T Ep1034
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: CNY Stylish ManThe Chef M Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome the Year of Snake with Stylish ManThe Chef to kick off your festive joy! Hosted by Golden Bell Award winner Sam Tseng, Genie Chuo, and professional chef James, the show is packed with hilarious moments and practical cooking tips. This New Year, let laughter and delicious food brighten your celebrations with endless excitement!

programme.title: CNY Hot Door Night M Ep1
programme.desc: With Hank Chen and Lulu, Jacky Wus dearest companions, planning his heartwarming homecoming trip, theyre bringing the unique passion of Hot Door Night down south for a lively gratitude festival with loyal fans. Join us on this unforgettable journey!Lulu

programme.title: CNY Blessing of Formosa T Ep408
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life.This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easytounderstand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stylish ManThe Chef M Ep3955
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stylish ManThe Chef M Ep3601
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan T Ep1071
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night M Ep1985
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in crosstalk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep223
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep3781
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the public housing estate where he grew up, not to visit his aging father, but to seek refuge after his business has failed. When his family of five squeeze into the small estate unit, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brothers death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Frozen North - In the remote reaches of Asia's frozen north, creatures must overcome unique challenges, finding exceptional ways to thrive in a hostile world that pushes life to its very limits.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tangled Worlds - Asia's jungles are beautiful and exceptionally diverse, but whilst they provide shelter, food and opportunity, they are also full of dangers and hidden threats.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Crowded Continent - In the planet's most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Arid Heart - In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earth's toughest.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Saving Asia - Many passionate people are dedicated to saving the wild animals of Asia. These individuals and their ingenious solutions give us hope and optimism for the future of the continent.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the people of China from January to April as the Chinese concept of 24 solar terms is explained. After Chinese New Year we witness a stunning Lantern Festival in Nanjing.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As the mid-autumn festival brings families together, and September turns into October, we find out how autumn rains make life difficult for engineers building a huge dam out of concrete.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The team begins a six-month expedition following lions, leopards and cheetahs.

programme.title: Sue Perkins Into Alaska S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the final episode of her epic Alaskan adventure, Sue rounds off this trip of a lifetime by heading even further off the beaten track and visiting amazing communities living in the extreme wilderness. She meets inspiring Alaska Native communities, discovers the challenges of life on the edge, and asks what the future holds for this great state.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kill or be Killed - In a world where enemies watch for weakness, our ancient powers must use all their strength and cunning to defend their people and conquer new lands. Who will rise to the challenge of the battlefield.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Borneo - Borneo is rich with diverse and strange wildlife, including a sea monster Robson is hunting - a monster that can disappear.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The team begins a six-month expedition following lions, leopards and cheetahs.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Beneath the Waves - Asia has the longest coastline of any continent and the earth's richest coral reefs. This episode explores Asia's waters, as spectacular as they are diverse, and never-seen-before animal behaviour.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Norway - The next few weeks on Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild will see the presenter pay visits to previous contributors to the series - and tonight he travels to Norway to catch up with former Stone Age host Lynx, who now lives in the Norwegian wilderness.

She meets inspiring Alaska Native communities, discovers the challenges of life on the edge, and asks what the future holds for this great state.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Freshwater: Timing Is Everything - Freshwater is often the stage on which millions of animals gather to find a mate. And the cycle of freshwater is the trigger for spectacular mating rituals and fierce competition.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ancestors - Michael Wood joins the Qin family reunion, when 300 relatives gather to worship their ancestors on Tomb Sweeping Day, before visiting some excavations at Erlitou.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Silk Roads and China Ships - In the backstreets and markets of Xi'an, Michael meets descendants of the traders from central Asia and Persia who came into China on the Silk Road.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Golden Age - In Twin Dragon Alley, in the city of Kaifeng, locals tell Michael him the legend of the baby boys who became emperors. He looks at China's most famous work of art - the Kaifeng scroll.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Ming - Michael Wood recounts the tale of one of China's most famous dynasties beginning with the amazing story of Hongwu, a peasant rebel who founded one of greatest eras in Chinese history.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Last Empire - China's last empire, the Qing, began in violence and war but Michael reveals how under the Qing, China doubled in size to include Xinjiang, Mongolia and Tibet.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Age of Revolution - Michael reveals how three cataclysmic revolutions between 1850 and 1950 shook China to the core. He ends his story with Mao's death and the boom time of the last thirty years.

programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.desc: Alexander witnesses a volcanic eruption, visits the original geyser, learns about the Icelandic belief in elves, takes a trip to an unusual museum and meets an Icelandic rock band.

programme.desc: Having been fearful of hippos since a young boy, Steve Backshall sets out to discover why hippos are considered the most dangerous animals in Africa, and if their aggressive reputation is misunderstood.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Naples and the Amalfi Coast - Stanley Tucci feasts on pizza in Naples, searches for the best San Marzano tomatoes and continues his culinary journey on the island of Ischia and the Amalfi Coast.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep13
programme.desc: In Canada, there's nowhere to go as homes are washed down river. An ice skater is on thin ice in New Jersey and a cliff edge in Brazil collapses after heavy rain.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Ecuador - In the last episode of the series, Robson Green fishes for the voracious grouper fish off the coast of Ecuador.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wines New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Eriks head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mias life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: My Best Friend's an Animal S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sammi, Rose and Casey - Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Cold Blood - Discover a land where reptiles rule. More than 170 species of reptiles live in Arabia, including the two-foot vegetarian dhub, the bad-tempered monitor lizard, geckos with night vision, and massive sea turtles that come ashore only to lay their eggs.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Nagaina: Queen of Kings - In the hot forest of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission: to find a mate, find food, and lay eggs before the monsoon arrives.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lethal By Design - Snakes, spiders, and scorpions are the kind of creepy crawlies many fear the most. But in Africa, these species are refined predators. Explore the hunting methods, special skills, and secret love lives of these venomous creatures.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Remarkable Reptiles - Lurking in the shadows of Africa is an incredible diversity of reptiles we seldom see. Masters of the underworld, these snakes and lizards have conquered almost every habitat on the continent while evolving a remarkable set of adaptations to survive.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - Brave the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. Unveil New Zealands dazzling invertebrate population and examine the remarkable lives of flesh-eating centipedes, giant nocturnal crickets, fishing spiders, hungry glow-worms, and more.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast S1 Ep1

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with colour, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Social Network - Ponder shark community hierarchies as the northern team studies how young blacktips learn social and survival skills. Then rush to Rainbow Beach with the southern team, who are eager to witness the sand tiger sharks most elusive behaviour: mating.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wines New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Eriks head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mias life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Chemical Weapons - Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Escape - Watch as the Lilongwe Wildlife team try to release two serval cats into the wild. One escapes and returns injured. Will their release be successful? A new baby vervet arrives in critical condition, and a giant owl flies to freedom.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Buck Chase - Join Amanda on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poacher's snare. Meanwhile, the centre's resident hyena is treated for flea bitten ears and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Detour - Travel to the ends of Australias shark highways. Find out if Greenly Island in the south is a truck stop for migrating great whites, then search for proof of a genetic connection between northern bull sharks and their cooler-climate cousins.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves hes much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: My Best Friend's an Animal S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bandit, Max and George - Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep3

programme.title: Arabian Inferno S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life And Death In The Dunes - The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, so its inhabitants must be resilient and specialized. Explore the unique adaptations of the unicorn-inspiring Arabian oryx, Ruppells fox, and the elusive sand cat.

programme.title: Deadly Australians S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wetlands - The waters originating from highland streams flow through varied terrain before emptying into the sea. Along the way, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for fierce battles between predators and prey.

programme.title: Deadly Australians S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Forests - Deep in the Australian forests, lethal predators lie in wait to ambush their prey. Here, Amethystine Pythons lurk high up in the canopy, Tiger Quolls troll the forest floor, and deadly scorpions dwell in the shadows of the undergrowth.

programme.title: Deadly Australians S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - A motley crew of killers, con artists, and gang members fight for supremacy amidst the dry and desolate Australian desert. Here, heat and dehydration kill indiscriminately and competition for resources is brutal. Only the toughest survive.

programme.title: Deadly Australians S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Oceans - The Australian coastline is a magnet for marine assassins of all shapes and sizes. Though they vary in appearance and tactics, these vicious predators share one common trait: they are all exceptional killers.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Strange Powers - Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Great Elephant Tale - Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Careful, There's Humans Up There! - Follow the southern team as they test new migration tech and tools that could reduce shark attacks in a popular snorkelling spot. Then catch and tag bull sharks with the northern team, who want to help local swimmers steer clear of birthing mothers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Road To Recovery - Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Escape - Watch as the Lilongwe Wildlife team try to release two serval cats into the wild. One escapes and returns injured. Will their release be successful? A new baby vervet arrives in critical condition, and a giant owl flies to freedom.

programme.desc: Big Buck Chase - Join Amanda on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poacher's snare. Meanwhile, the centre's resident hyena is treated for flea bitten ears and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: My Best Friend's an Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Wonders Of The Wadi - Sidle up to a desert wadia rare place in the arid landscape where bedrock traps traces of water to create a life-giving waterhole. In these vital valleys, thirsty animals must brave venomous vipers, glowing scorpions, and stalking tarantulas.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Explore the stunning caves of Khammouane province in Laos. These natural wonders, squeezed between the Mekong River and the Annamite Range, are home to part-time and full-time residents, including bats, geckos, frogs, and giant centipedes.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: The River Basin - From manicured rice fields to wild tropical rainforests, the Mekong River is the source of life for eastern Thailand. Watch gibbons negotiate family dynamics, and see how the pit viper creates danger for the regions delicate living networks.

programme.title: Secrets Of Wild Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secret Life of Snakes - With more than 300 species, the snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit. Discover their clever hunting techniques, along with the ways their favourite prey, lizards, have evolved to outwit them.

programme.title: Secrets Of Wild Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Crocodiles - Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted with skull-crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on Earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now protected in Australia, their numbers have surged.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Squirrel Monkey Island - Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Explore the stunning caves of Khammouane province in Laos. These natural wonders, squeezed between the Mekong River and the Annamite Range, are home to part-time and full-time residents, including bats, geckos, frogs, and giant centipedes.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S6 Ep3

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S6 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hassler, Rome - Rob and Monica work in one of Europe's last remaining family-owned 'grande dame' hotels - boasting a deep history and celebrity clientele list right in the heart of the Eternal City.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Bread Week - It's bread week in the Bake Off tent and Siba and Paul task the bakers with pizza making in the signature Challenge. It all comes down to the showstopper, involving elaborate bread structures and loaves from around the world.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Swedish House Man's Food - Rachel makes a wonderful dish with butternut squash waffles, and a mixed cherry tomato salad with crispy bacon. She picks kale from the west coast of Sweden, and sees a large-scale tomato farm.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Christmas: Wildnerness Hotel Inari - Rob Rinder and Monica Galetti visit Wilderness Hotel Inari, an adventure hotel above the Arctic Circle in Lapland.

programme.title: Grand Designs S20 Ep9
programme.desc: In 2015, Vicky and Ed set out to transform a derelict cowshed into a 21st-century smallholding in Somerset. Six years on, how much has this wildly ambitious project changed their lives?

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Autumn - Jamie rounds up his autumnal offerings with some gorgeous squash in a cheesy sauce, a zingy celeriac dressing for his remoulade and a foraged blackberry, apple and pear cobbler.

programme.desc: Nigella's grandmother's recipe for creme caramel provides the inspiration for a simple but elegant dessert of caramel custard.
